about_the_game:
The Game MorphaVerse


MorphaVerse is a turn-based combat, monster taming, deckbuilding game.
In MorphaVerse you explore different worlds, collect monsters with which you create your team for fights.
The fights are supported by cards, which means you not only need monsters for your fights but also cards.
The battles in MorphaVerse are turn-based in which you have to use your cards and monsters skillfully to win.

Features:


  • Story campaign: in which you explore the secrets of the MorphaVerse, collect your monsters and cards and fight your battles.
  • Taming Monsters: you have many monsters to choose from, some of which evolve as you level them up.
  • Card deck: the cards you use significantly influence your strategy in battle.
  • Different story endings: In MorphaVerse, your actions will influence the course of the game.
